mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOTDEAL_COMMENT ( COMMENT_ID, HOTDEAL_ID, PARENT_ID, USERNAME, CONTENT, REG_DATE, IS_EDITED, EDIT_DATE ) VALUES ( HOTDEAL_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hotdealId}, #{parentId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{username}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_ID AS commentId, HOTDEAL_ID AS hotdealId, PARENT_ID AS parentId, USERNAME, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS regDate, IS_EDITED AS isEdited, TO_CHAR(EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS editDate FROM HOTDEAL_COMMENT WHERE HOTDEAL_ID = #{hotdealId} ORDER BY COMMENT_ID ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTDEAL_COMMENT WHERE PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
